summary: REQ-50’s Public Preview footer note appears to be implemented in the footer component, and the compliance disclaimer text remains unchanged. However, the diff summary also indicates multiple unrelated frontend changes (not requested) including routing/access changes and various page/content modifications, which violate the “footer note only / no gating or routing changes” constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Routing/access behavior changed: making /brief, /portfolio, and /library public routes (accessible without sign-in).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids altering existing features, gating logic, or routing behavior; requested change is footer-note-only.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified “demo mode” behavior for unauthenticated users on Today’s Brief and Portfolio pages, including “Sample / Preview” indicators and sign-in prompts for actions.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest is limited to adding a footer note only and explicitly disallows other feature/layout/copy changes beyond that note.

hallucinated_features.description: Alerts page content changed to a simplified set of three “guardian-style toggle rules” with descriptions.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside the footer note scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Library page states/copy and upgrade CTAs implemented/changed, including Pro-locked states and upgrade messaging.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly out of scope (non-goals include changing Pro entitlement behavior / adding paywall behavior).
evidence: project_state.json (summary mentions “PulseBrief Pro” soft paywall and upgrade CTAs)

hallucinated_features.description: Profile page/header and sign-in-related UI changes (e.g., “Back to Home” / “Return to PulseBrief” button; header now uses ClickableWordmark).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside footer note scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Protected route guard behavior/infrastructure modified (redirect/modal sign-in infrastructure).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest forbids changes to gating logic/access behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Research Mode page content/structure and “save to library” functionality referenced/changed.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly a non-goal to change Research page content.
